SEARCH
Package album

Class Collection

java.lang.Object
album.Collection
public class Collection extends Object
The Collection class which creates an array to store the Album objects Has the functionality of sorting, rating, adding, and removing albums in the array
Author:
Rohan Sharma

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    ARRAY_GROWTH_SIZE

    INITIAL_CAPACITY
     
    static final int
    NOT_FOUND
     

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Collection()
    Constructor for the collection class that initializes the array to store albums, named albums The array is initialized to have a constant size of 4 which is stored as a constant named INITIAL_CAPACITY The size of the array is initially set to 0 because the array does not yet house any album objects

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    add(Album album)
    A method to add an album objects to the albums array, an album that already exists in the array is not added

    A method that determines whether the albums array contains a specific album object inputted as a parameter
    void
    displayAlbums()
    A method to print out all Album objects in the albums array
    Album[]
    getAlbums()
    Getter method for the Album[] albums data structure Important in accessing the albums because iterating through the array is the only way to directly access them
    int
    getSize()
    Getter method for the size variable Useful for determining the stopping point of for loops iterating through the albums array
    void
    printByDate()
    Sorts by release date then prints all the albums
    void
    printByGenre()
    Sorts by Genre then prints all the albums

    Sorts by Rating and then prints all albums

    Album
    returnAlbum(Album album)
     
    void
    selectionSortDate(Album[] albums)
    A method that implements the selection sort algorithm prioritizing the release date If release date is equal then the album title is used to break the tie
    void
    selectionSortGenre(Album[] albums)
    A method that implements the selection sort algorithm prioritizing the Genre If Genre is equal then the artist is used to break the tie
    void
    selectionSortRating(Album[] albums)
    A method that implements the selection sort algorithm prioritizing the average rating If average rating is equal then the title is used to break the tie
    void

    Setter method for Album[] albums data structure Useful in updating the albums variable after the capacity is increased by 4

  • Constructor Details

    • Collection

      public Collection()
      Constructor for the collection class that initializes the array to store albums, named albums The array is initialized to have a constant size of 4 which is stored as a constant named INITIAL_CAPACITY The size of the array is initially set to 0 because the array does not yet house any album objects

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Getter method for the size variable Useful for determining the stopping point of for loops iterating through the albums array
      Returns:
      size: an int representing how many albums are in the array, not the length of the array

    • setSize

      public void setSize(int size)
      Setter method for the size variable Useful when the albums array's capacity needs to be incremented by 4
      Parameters:
      size - : an integer value representing how many albums are in the albums array

    • getAlbums

      public Album[] getAlbums()
      Getter method for the Album[] albums data structure Important in accessing the albums because iterating through the array is the only way to directly access them
      Returns:
      albums: an array of type Album holding all the albums added

    • setAlbums

      public void setAlbums(Album[] albums)
      Setter method for Album[] albums data structure Useful in updating the albums variable after the capacity is increased by 4
      Parameters:
      albums - : an array of type Album

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Album album)
      A method that determines whether the albums array contains a specific album object inputted as a parameter
      Parameters:
      album - : An album object
      Returns:
      true: the album exists in the albums array

    • add

      public boolean add(Album album)
      A method to add an album objects to the albums array, an album that already exists in the array is not added
      Parameters:
      album - : an album object
      Returns:
      true: the album does not already exist in the array and was added

    • returnAlbum

      public Album returnAlbum(Album album)

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Album album)
      A method that removes the inputted album from the albums array if it is present
      Parameters:
      album - : an Album object
      Returns:
      true: the album existed in the albums array and was removed

    • rate

      public void rate(Album album, int rating)
      A method that assigns a rating to an album if it exists in the albums array
      Parameters:
      album - : an Album object
      rating - : an int ranging from 1 to 5

    • selectionSortRating

      public void selectionSortRating(Album[] albums)
      A method that implements the selection sort algorithm prioritizing the average rating If average rating is equal then the title is used to break the tie
      Parameters:
      albums - : an array holding Album objects

    • selectionSortGenre

      public void selectionSortGenre(Album[] albums)
      A method that implements the selection sort algorithm prioritizing the Genre If Genre is equal then the artist is used to break the tie
      Parameters:
      albums - : an array holding Album objects

    • selectionSortDate

      public void selectionSortDate(Album[] albums)
      A method that implements the selection sort algorithm prioritizing the release date If release date is equal then the album title is used to break the tie
      Parameters:
      albums - : an array holding Album objects

    • displayAlbums

      public void displayAlbums()
      A method to print out all Album objects in the albums array

    • printByRating

      public void printByRating()
      Sorts by Rating and then prints all albums

    • printByGenre

      public void printByGenre()
      Sorts by Genre then prints all the albums

    • printByDate

      public void printByDate()
      Sorts by release date then prints all the albums
